author: namapane
body:
#### PR description:

- Minor optimizations discussed in #28180 (some computations moved from MF query calls to constructor)
- move if(debug) couts to MessageLogger
- some minor cleanup of deprecated, obsoleted or unused stuff.

#### PR validation:

Regression-tested for identical values against reference files for all maps/currents/eras.

Optimizations found to sum up to a 0.5% speedup for non-cached MF calls, according to callgrind.
title: Magnetic Field optimization
